extension.description: An OpenAI ChatGPT API client for VSCode

config.decorations.inactiveContextOpacit: Controls the opacity of inactive context lines, `0.0` is completely transparent, while a value of `1.0` is completely opaque.
config.instructions.nameMessage.descript: Controls the Copilot's behavior when generating file names. Customize to change naming patterns.
config.instructions.namePathFormat.descr: Can specify the path format for `Name and Save As...` command. This format is referenced in the `Name Message`.
config.instructions.pasteAsPrettyTextMes: Controls how Copilot formats pasted text from clipboard. Modify to change formatting behavior.
config.instructions.summarizeContextMess: Controls the Copilot's behavior when summarizing the context. Customize to change summarizing patterns.
config.instructions.systemMessage.descri: Controls the Copilot's behavior, allowing changes to its personality or specific behavior instructions.
config.instructions.titleMessage.descrip: Controls the Copilot's behavior, allowing changes to its title instructions for the active context.
config.backend.apiKey.description: Your API key for accessing AI services. Can be obtained from [OpenAI Platform](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys), [Azure OpenAI](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/openai/quickstart), or other supported services.
config.backend.apiKey.error.openai: Incorrect API key provided. Can be obtained from [OpenAI Platform](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys).
config.backend.apiKey.error.openRouter: Incorrect API key provided. Can be obtained from [Provisioning API Keys](https://openrouter.ai/docs/features/provisioning-api-keys).
config.backend.baseUrl.description:
Can specify the backend base URL or leave it empty if using default.
- **Azure** (format): `https://{your-resource-name}.openai.azure.com/openai/deployments/{deployment-id}/completions?api-version={api-version}`, see [Azure OpenAI Service REST API reference](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/openai/reference#completions)
- **Ollama** (default): `http://localhost:11434/v1`, see [OpenAI compatibility](https://ollama.com/blog/openai-compatibility)
- **OpenRouter** (default): `https://openrouter.ai/api/v1`, see [OpenRouter Quickstart Guide](https://openrouter.ai/docs/quickstart)
config.backend.baseUrl.error.azure:
Error occurred while parsing backend base URL: `{0}`
Can specify the Azure Base URL. The URL format is `https://{your-resource-name}.openai.azure.com/openai/deployments/{deployment-id}/completions?api-version={api-version}`. Refer to the [Azure OpenAI Service REST API reference](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/ai-services/openai/reference#completions) for details.
config.backend.protocol.description: Can specify the backend protocol. `OpenAI`, `Azure`, `Ollama`, `OpenRouter` are supported.
config.options.model.description: Can specify the models listed in [Models](https://platform.openai.com/docs/models), if `â†’ Model Name Text` selected, the following setting will be used.
config.options.modelNameText.description: Can specify the model name as text, which varies by backend.
config.options.temperature.description: Can specify a value between `0.0` and `1.0` or empty. If empty, the temperature setting is omitted. Higher values like `0.8` will make the output more random, while lower values like `0.2` will make it more focused and deterministic. [FAQ](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/text-generation/how-should-i-set-the-temperature-parameter) helps to determine the value.
config.indentation.quoteCharacter.descri: Can specify the character(s) used for quote indentation in Markdown. Default is `>`, but you can use characters like `>|` or other combinations.
